questions.title: Write the skeleton of Dart program.

Write a program to print the following output:
Hello world!!!

Write a code to print the following output:
Name:		Mr. X
Univ:		University of Dhaka

Write a program to print the following output:
            *
           ***
          *****
         *******
        *********
         *******
          *****
           ***
            *

Write a program to print the following output: [There are two blank lines in the middle]
Name:		Mr. DON
Country:	Bangladesh


Contact:	mr.don@mycompany.com

Take three integer variables a, b and c. Assign values to the variables- 
     a = 10, b = 20 and c = 30; Now print the sum of these three variables.

You are given the  radius of a circle, r = 5.5.We know that, pi=3.1416. Now write a program to calculate the area of the given circle and print it up to 2 digit after the decimal point. [The result should look like: XX.XX]

Take four double variables x, y, z and avg. Assign values to x, y and z as you want. Now calculate the average of x, y and z and assign it to avg. Finally print the average value like- 
Average of x, y and z is: ----- .

Rahul got 65.00 on physics, 83.50 on mathematics, 85.75 on C programming and 67.50 on English. Now write a program to calculate the average of his marks on 4 subjects and print it up to 2 digit after the decimal point. [The result should look like: XX.XX]

Take four integer variables a, b, x and y. Scan the values of the variables from user using scanf() function. Now print the output of the following equation:
(a*b) + (x*y)

Take temperature of Dhaka city as input in celsius scale from the user using double.parse function and convert it to fahrenheit and print it.
[Formula:  F = C(9/5) +32]
Take a small letter alphabet as input from the user and print the capital version of that letter. [If user gives input ‘a’ you should print ‘A’]

Suppose you are going to apply for admission in a college. If you got GPA 5 in SSC exam then you can apply for that college. Now give your GPA as input from the keyboard and print “YES” if you can apply otherwise print “NO”.

Take a value from user and assume that it is the number of his math exam.
Now you have to write a program which shows the grade depending on the given scale.
(A+: 80-100, A: 70-79, A-:  60-69, B: 50-59, C: 40-49,  D :33-39 ,F :0-32)
You are going to open a bank account .  If your age is greater than 18 then you can open an account. Get your age by input and print “Yes” if you can open an account otherwise print “No”.
Write a program which determines  whether a number is ODD or EVEN.
Take an integer number as input from user and print “Yes” if the number is divisible by 3 and 5. And print “No” if the number is not.
Take 3 integers from user using int.parse function and write a program to find the maximum one.
Take a small letter alphabet as input and print whether it is VOWEL or CONSONANT.
Write a program that takes an integer as input ( 1 - 12 ) and print the corresponding month name.[If user gives input ‘1’ you should print ‘January’]
Print the EVEN numbers between 1 to 100 using loop.
Print the numbers between 100 to 200 which are completely divisible by 3 and 5.

Write a program to print the following output using loop.
*
* *
* * *
* * * *

Take an integer as input and print it’s multiplication table up to 10. If user gives 5, your output should look like the following example-
5 * 1 = 5
5 * 2 = 10
5 * 3 = 15.
.
.
5 * 10 = 50
Find summation and average of all the numbers which are completely divisible by 3, 5 and 12 between 10 - 500. [Like 60 is divisible by all of those]

Write a program which will display all the prime numbers  between 0 to N( N will be given by the user ).
If user gives N = 20, your code will print the following output-
2  3  5  7  11  13  17  19
Take an array of integer data type of size 10. Get input from user and store the values in the array and finally print the sum of those 10 integers.
Take an array of integer data type of size 5. Scan the values from the user. Now print the number of how many integers are greater than 100.

You are given the following array of integers-
[1, 23, 10, 15, 17, 21, 44, 43, 53]. 
Now write a program which will print the prime numbers with its index.
Write a function that takes two integers as input and prints their sum inside the function.
Write  a function that takes an integer as input and prints EVEN if the number is divisible by 2 otherwise prints ODD. Call this function from the main function.
Write a function that takes an integer as input and prints all of its divisors. Call this function from the main function.

Suppose you are going to make a simple calculator. Your task is to prepare  four functions- add(), subtract(), multiply() and divide() . Each function takes two parameters and return the value after applying the corresponding action on those parameters.
Write a function named findMax(). It takes three parameters and return the maximum value among the three parameters. Call this function from the main function.
Write  a currency converter function named dollarToBDT(). It takes US Dollar as input in a float variable and return the amount of Bangladeshi Taka. [Change rate: 1 USD = 78.55 BDT]
Dart Class Syntax
Dart classes and Object are explain properly with code
Another Example For Inheritance in Dart
write a Polymorphism Example on Dart
write a Encapsulation Example on Dart
Write a abstraction class on Dart
Write a interface class on Dart
Write a program that opens a file named myFile.txt on write mode and write 100(integer) into that file.
Write a program which will delete all the text from a text file and write “LOVE” on that file.
Create a text file in your computer and write 10 integers in 10 separate lines. Now write a program which will open the file and read that 10 integers. Finally print the average of that ten integers.
Write a program which takes an integer as input and print “YES, Prime” if the number is prime otherwise “NO”.
Write a program which will take the length of three sides of a triangle and print the measures of the three angles.
Read two numbers A and B from user. Calculate and print the sum of their factorials. Be careful, because the result may have more than 15 digits.

A dog eats just half of its supply of food in one day. Write a program that scans the initial capacity of the food supply (in Kg), and calculate how many days will pass before the dog eat all the supply food until left 1 Kg or less.
Take a decimal number as input and print the binary version of that number.
Write a program which will find the greatest common divisor of two numbers. If user gives input 5 and 30, your output should be 5.

Write a program to calculate the nearest integer number of the square root value of a number. User will give the number as input. Your program will find the square root value of that number and print the nearest integer of that value.
